attributes.action: Only approve development where approved and funded plans are in place to fund adaquate sewage and drainage systems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Only approve development where approved and funded plans are in place to ensure that sewage and drainage systems have capacity to cope with extreme weather events.

 Ensure that capital costs for improving infrastructure for new developments do not fall on existing residents, via increased utility bills or council tax.
